good morning: how to I get to [insert location here]?
Magandang umaga: Papano ako makaka punta sa [insert location here]?

good morning: I am [Insert age here] years old
Magandang umaga: [Insert age here] taon na po ako

good morning: may I have some mineral water?
Magandang umaga: Pahinge ako ng mineral na tubig? (Foreigners do not drink the regular tap water in the Philippines)
